comments: original paper setup but with weight decay [mini-batch][smaller lr]
optimizer: lambda parameters: torch.optim.SGD( parameters, lr=setup["lr"], momentum=setup["momentum"], weight_decay=setup["weight_decay"] )
loss_function: lambda output, target, reduction='mean': torch.nn.functional.binary_cross_entropy(output.reshape(-1), target.float(), reduction=reduction)
evaluate_correct: lambda output, target: torch.sum( torch.round(output.reshape(-1)) == target, dtype=torch.float32 )
